statements: SELECT * FROM MusicTherapyArticles WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT title, author FROM MusicTherapyArticles WHERE publication_date = '2021-07-15';
SELECT author, title, publication_date FROM MusicTherapyArticles WHERE article_id IN (2, 4);
SELECT * FROM MusicTherapyArticles WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT article_id, title, author, publication_date FROM MusicTherapyArticles WHERE author LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM MusicTherapyArticles WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM MusicTherapyArticles WHERE author LIKE '%Johnson%' ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT article_id, title, author, publication_date FROM MusicTherapyArticles WHERE author = 'Emily Smith' AND publication_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM MusicTherapyArticles WHERE content LIKE '%relaxation%' OR content LIKE '%stress%' ORDER BY publication_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS article_count FROM MusicTherapyArticles GROUP BY author HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY article_count DESC, publication_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM research_articles;
SELECT title, author FROM research_articles;
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE resource_type = 'Book';
SELECT description FROM resources WHERE resource_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM research_articles ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM research_articles WHERE author='John Doe';
SELECT author, title, publish_date FROM research_articles ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT title, author FROM research_articles WHERE author LIKE '%Smith%' AND publish_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM research_articles WHERE author='Alice Johnson' OR author='Bob Williams';
SELECT title, url FROM research_articles JOIN resources ON research_articles.article_id = resources.resource_id;
SELECT * FROM research_articles;
SELECT article_title, publication_date FROM research_articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT article_title FROM research_articles WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM studies WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM resources ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT article_title, publication_date FROM research_articles WHERE article_id = 1;
SELECT study_title, study_description, researcher_name FROM studies ORDER BY study_title DESC;
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE resource_type = 'Database' OR resource_type = 'API' ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT article_title, publication_date FROM research_articles WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_articles, AVG(article_id) AS average_article_id FROM research_articles;
SELECT title, author FROM research_articles;
SELECT publication_date, content FROM research_articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM studies WHERE researcher = 'John Smith';
SELECT study_name, findings FROM studies WHERE study_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT link, resource_name FROM resources ORDER BY resource_name;
SELECT id, title, author FROM research_articles WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT study_name, researcher, findings FROM studies ORDER BY study_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, resource_name, source, link FROM resources WHERE source LIKE 'PubMed%';
SELECT * FROM music_therapy_centers WHERE location = 'New York' AND center_name LIKE '%Health%';
SELECT id, center_name, contact_info FROM music_therapy_centers WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM research_articles;
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM research_articles WHERE publication_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT article_id, author, title FROM research_articles WHERE author LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM studies ORDER BY study_date DESC;
SELECT study_title, researcher FROM studies WHERE study_date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM research_articles ORDER BY publication_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT article_id, title, author FROM research_articles WHERE publication_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date;

SELECT research_articles.title, research_articles.author, resources.url FROM research_articles JOIN resources ON research_articles.article_id = resources.resource_id WHERE resources.resource_type = 'Link';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%anxiety%' ORDER BY patient_name;
SELECT therapist_name, location, contact_information FROM therapists WHERE specialty = 'Psychology' ORDER BY therapist_name;
